short_summary: Electrical upgrades "at Leonardville Harbour on Deer Island, New Brunswick_
description: The project involves electrical modernization / upgrades of Leonardville wharf structure in New Brunswick, with a reportable start date of March 31st, 2024.
full_summary:
# Electrical Upgrades for Leonardville Wharf
## Request for Proposal

**Tender Reference:** cb-498-50563831
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** 30004065

**Public Notice:**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the electrical upgrades at Leonardville Wharf, Deer Island, New Brunswick. The project involves furnishing all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials for electrical remediation/upgrades to the wharf structure.

**Project Details:**
- **Estimated Contract Start Date:** July 24, 2023
- **Estimated Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024
- **Contract Value:** Will be determined based on the submitted proposals.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The respondent's proposal will be evaluated on the basis of the lowest price as per the _[Note: Selection Criteria]_.

**Trade Agreements and Regions:**
The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is available to contractors with headquarters in Canada. The project location is in New Brunswick, Canada.

**Scope of Work:**
The project scope includes:

- New electrical services on the wharf and floats
- Installation of a new electrical building
- Removal and disposal of existing equipment
- Mobilization and demobilization of necessary equipment
- Compliance with all specifications and accompanying drawings

**Interested Contractors:**
To obtain the tender documents and for further information, please contact Karen Dolan at DFO [tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca) or (782) 377-7245.

**Cancellation Notice:**
Please note that the tender closure date was **July 20, 2023, at 13:00 Hrs (Atlantic Daylight Time)**.

The rewritten text is meant to be a clean and concise overview of the tender announcement, making it easy to find the information.
